name: The Year Is 20CV Remake
description:
The year is 20CV. Tracking time is no longer possible. The world is overtaken by sentient viruses, sand monsters, and bloodthirsty bats. You're about to get supplies so that you can survive. There are obstacles that you must overcome no matter what. Good luck.

**Game does not run in the background, clicking outside of play screen will pause the game**

This is a fun little "remake" of my first ever game.

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/381114007/
